EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Optimize and Automate your SAP Testing - APAC - Aug 2014.Email - Last
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Tomorrow: Optimize and Automate Your SAP Testing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Optimize and Automate Your SAP Testing
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Hear how customers such as BMW, Siemens and Vienna Insurance Group leveraged Tricentis Tosca Testsuite for SAP to optimize time-to-market, quality and cost.
In this webinar, you will learn how to:
- Manage Time and Budget Constraints in SAP Implementations - Identify and Manage Risk Associated with Change - Manage SAP’s Dynamic Test Data Environment
Tosca Testsuite has an SAP-certified integration that systematically imports data and models from SAP Solution Manager. You can convert these models into test cases, automate them with ease, and then use them to optimize your environment by visualizing, managing and mitigating risk.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-optimize-and-automate-your-sap-testing-apac.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-optimize-and-automate-your-sap-testing-apac.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal> Wed. Aug 13, 2014 1:00 p.m. – 2:00 p.m. AEST
Thomas Hadorn Managing Director (APAC) Tricentis
Brent Dixon Professional Services Manager (APAC) Tricentis
